words.source: H559 conj. + Qal perf. 2ms of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'and thou shalt say', ESV 'and you shall say', NASB 'and you shall say'
H413 prep. + 3ms suff. 'to him'; KJV 'unto him', ESV 'to him', NASB 'to him'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H430 n.mp constr. אֱלֹהִים 'God'; KJV 'the God of', ESV 'the God of', NASB 'the God of'
H5680 art. + gentilic n.mp עִבְרִי 'Hebrew'; KJV 'the Hebrews', ESV 'the Hebrews', NASB 'the Hebrews'
H7971 Qal perf. 3ms + 1cs suff. of שָׁלַח 'to send'; KJV 'hath sent me', ESV 'sent me', NASB 'sent me'
H413 prep. + 2ms suff. 'to you'; KJV 'unto thee', ESV 'to you', NASB 'to you'
H559 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'saying', ESV 'saying', NASB 'saying'
H7971 Piel imv. 2ms of שָׁלַח 'to send, let go'; KJV 'let … go', ESV 'let … go', NASB 'let … go'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H5971 n.ms constr. + 1cs suff. עַם 'people'; KJV 'my people', ESV 'my people', NASB 'my people'
H5647 conj. + Qal impf. 3mp + 1cs suff. of עָבַד 'to serve'; KJV 'that they may serve me', ESV 'that they may serve me', NASB 'that they may serve me'
H4057 prep. b- + art. + n.ms מִדְבָּר 'wilderness'; KJV 'in the wilderness', ESV 'in the wilderness', NASB 'in the wilderness'
H2009 conj. + interj. הִנֵּה 'behold'; KJV 'and, behold', ESV 'but', NASB 'but behold'
H3808 neg. particle לֹא 'not'; KJV 'not', ESV 'not', NASB 'not'
H8085 Qal perf. 2ms of שָׁמַע 'to hear, listen'; KJV 'thou wouldest not hear', ESV 'you have not listened', NASB 'you have not listened'
H5704 prep. עַד 'until, as far as'; KJV 'hitherto', ESV 'so far', NASB 'so far'
H3541 adv. כֹּה 'thus, here'; KJV 'hitherto', ESV 'so far', NASB 'so far'
